description: ff. 236. 229 x 94; 170 x 55 mm. 23 lin. 14th cen. On last fol. samāʻ dat. Jumādá I, 789. Commentary on the Tajrīd of Naṣīr al-Dīn al-Ṭūsī, d. 672/1274, known as al-Sharḥ al-qadīm: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 670 (commentary b); S I, 925. Title varies: Tashfīd al-qawāʻid... (Fihris al-kutub al-mawjūdah bi-al-Maktabah al-Azharīyah, III, 125), Tasdīd... (Bank. X, 595; Topkapı Sarayı Müzesi Kütüphanesi Arapc̦a yazmalar kataloğu, 4808), etc. Incip.: ... الحمد لله المتوحد بوجوب الوجود ودوام البقاء
author: Iṣfahānī, Maḥmūd ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, 1275 or 1276-1348 or 1349
title: Tasdīd al-ʻaqāʼid fī sharḥ Tajrīd al-qawāʻid.
creator: Iṣfahānī, Maḥmūd ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, 1275 or 1276-1348 or 1349
subject: Ṭūsī, Naṣīr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1201-1274—Tajrīd al-iʻtiqād.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
